name: Eden Falls
description:
Eden Falls is an  exploration-focused adventure game for PC, Mac & Linux. 

Play as Xander, a newcomer to the seemingly idyllic town of Eden Falls, as he embarks on a quest to find his missing sister. On the surface, Eden Falls appears to be a lush utopia in which everyone is content and happy, but be warned; all is not what it seems. Searching the forest may uncover some hidden secrets and clues, but beware of dangers lurking beneath the surface. 

Keep posted via our dev blog.
